casebody.data:
STATE
v.
ADAMS 2018-0974 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Prohibition. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. On relator's motion to amend. Motion denied. O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. Kennedy, French, and DeWine, JJ., concur in granting respondent's motion to dismiss but would also grant relator's motion to amend.
